name: Дровосек
description:
Warning! This game is in Russian only!

Controls:
Up, Down, Left, Right and Mouse.
Use: click the object in inventory, then object in scene. You must stay near object.

f2-save, f3-load, esc - menu

Note

You can download this (and other) game(s) for PC/Linux/MacOS X/Android/S60 and others OSes here: http://instead.syscall.ru Just install INSTEAD interpreter. The game itself is here: http://instead-games.ru/game.php?ID=118
